posts.post_title: FS/FT:  T201 Mecca Double Folders Walter Johnson PSA 5 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looking to consolidate my collection a little bit, and this one just doesn't fit anymore so making it available.

Prefer to sell, but I might consider trading depending on what it is.

"I'll take it" trumps any negotiations.

Price is delivered via priority mail just to keep things easy. If regular Paypal, add another 3% for the fees.

T201 Mecca Double Folder Walter Johnson PSA 5 - $OLD
